resources.string:
1. Create or select a syringe profile: 
 a. "Name" - A clear and unique name that is easily identifiable. 
 b. "Volume" The max volume the syringe can hold. 
 c. "Units" - The units printed on the syringe. 
 d. "Number of Lines" - Count the total number of lines put it in. 
 2. Align the syringe vertically, with the needle pointing upward. 
 3. Keep the syringe close to the camera and the background should be a solid, light color (perferably white). 
 4. When the camera is focused, press the button with a syringe on it to start the inference.
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
